argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rgspnid.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 2 |  | rgspnid.sr | |- ( ph -> A e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 3 |  | rgspnid.sp | |- ( ph -> S = ( ( RingSpan ` R ) ` A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_subrgss | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> A C_ ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A C_ ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( RingSpan ` R ) = ( RingSpan ` R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ssid | |- A C_ A |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> A C_ A ) |
| 11 | 1, 4, 7, 8, 3, 2, 10 | #P_rgspnmin | |- ( ph -> S C_ A ) |
| 12 | 1, 4, 7, 8, 3 | #P_rgspnssid | |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ph -> S = A ) |
